column1: * 1984 - The Book of Lost Tales Part One is published in the US.
* 2004 - At the http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/10th_Screen_Actors_Guild_Awards 10th Screen Actors Guild Awards
column2: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King wins the award for "Outstanding Performance by a Cast in a Motion Picture". The award is accepted by Bernard Hill.

column1: ** Samwise Gamgee sees Gollum and talks about him to Frodo Baggins.
In the text we are told that "the white rind of the new Moon could be seen glimmering in the remote lakes"
column2: which puts the actual new Moon rather earlier than astronomy would calculate.http://shire-reckoning.com/moon.html
